name: CactusGame
description:
You play as a Cactaceae.

Against 7 knives, all you have to protect yourself from the kidnappers are your old spines. At stake is your girlfriend, spineslinger.

How to play: Roll, move and release your spines to pop the red balloons why trying not to pop the pink one.

Controls: [WS and Left Mouse] - To kind of move; [Space] - To Jump; [TAB] - To unlock cursor; [Q] - To launch your spines

Disclaimer : Made it in almost half a day while spending the first half of the time trying to fix an OpenGL error I've noticed many are starting to have. It's almost playable!
